# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you based on its features and quality. I am proposing to sell it to you for $200. This price reflects the high value we place on the product and the excellent experience it can provide to its owner. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
